analyzed: kusalattika hetu duka

original: Hetu

original: nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu ca naabyākato nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti🔽hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu ca naakusalo nahetu
analyzed: na hetum dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na hetu ca na abyākataḥ na hetu ca dhammāḥ uppajjanti  hetu paccayā na kusalam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na hetu ca na akusalaḥ na hetu

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā pañca
translated: With a wholesome, cause-less, state as condition, a wholesome, cause-less, state and an unwholesome, cause-less, state arise, as the cause condition … five.

original: Naakusalaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na akusalam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With an unwholesome, cause-less, state as condition, an unwholesome, cause-less, state arises, as the cause condition.

original: Naakusalaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na akusalam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With an unwholesome root-cause as condition, a wholesome root-cause arises, by way of root-cause condition.

original: Naakusalaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Naakusalaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nahetu ca naabyākato nahetu ca dhammā
analyzed: na akusalam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na abyākataḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā  na akusalam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na hetu ca na abyākataḥ na hetu ca dhammā
translated: With an unwholesome root-cause as condition, a neutral root-cause arises, by way of root-cause condition.🔽With an unwholesome root-cause as condition, a wholesome and a neutral root-cause arise, by way of root-cause condition.

original: uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Naakusalaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu ca naakusalo🔽nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.🔽Naabyākataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Naabyākataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: uppajjanti hetu paccayā na akusalam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na hetu ca na akusalaḥ  na hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā pañca  na abyākatam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na abyākataḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā  na abyākatam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With an unwholesome root-cause as condition, a wholesome and an unwholesome root-cause arise, by way of root-cause condition.🔽With an unwholesome root-cause as condition, a wholesome, unwholesome and a neutral root-cause arise, by way of root-cause condition.🔽With a neutral root-cause as condition, a neutral root-cause arises, by way of root-cause condition.

original: Naabyākataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na abyākatam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With a neutral root-cause as condition, a wholesome root-cause arises, by way of root-cause condition.🔽With a neutral root-cause as condition, an unwholesome root-cause arises, by way of root-cause condition.

original: Naabyākataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu ca naabyākato nahetu ca dhammā
analyzed: na abyākatam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na hetu ca na abyākataḥ na hetu ca dhammā
translated: Dependent on a conditionally unclassifiable state without root-cause, skillful states without root-cause and conditionally unclassifiable states without root-cause …

original: uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Naabyākataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nahetu ca naabyākato🔽nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. analyzed: uppajjanti hetu paccayāḥ na abyākatam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na hetu ca na abyākataḥ  na hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā na abyākatam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ  na hetu ca na akusalaḥ na hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā cha  na kusalam na hetum ca na abyākatam na hetuñca dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na hetu dhammo  uppajjati hetu paccayā na kusalam na hetuñca na abyākatam na hetuñca dhammam paṭicca
translated: Dependent on a conditionally unclassifiable state without root-cause, unskillful states without root-cause and conditionally unclassifiable states without root-cause …

original: naakusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ nahetuñca naabyākataṁ nahetuñca🔽dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ nahetuñca
analyzed: na akusalaḥ na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na kusalam na hetuñca na abyākatam na hetuñca 🔽dhammam paṭicca na abyākataḥ na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na kusalam na hetuñca
translated: Dependent on a conditionally unclassifiable state without root-cause, skillful states without root-cause and unskillful states without root-cause and conditionally unclassifiable states without root-cause … six.

original: naabyākataṁ nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu ca naabyākato nahetu ca dhammā🔽uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ nahetuñca naabyākataṁ nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca🔽nakusalo nahetu ca naakusalo nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.
analyzed: na abyākatam na hetuñca dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na hetu ca na abyākataḥ na hetu ca dhammā  uppajjanti hetu paccayāḥ na kusalam na hetuñca na abyākatam na hetuñca dhammam paṭicca  na kusalaḥ na hetu ca na akusalaḥ na hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā pañca
translated: Dependent on a non-causally-related unwholesome and a non-causally-related indeterminate …

original: Naakusalaṁ nahetuñca naabyākataṁ nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu dhammo🔽uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naakusalaṁ nahetuñca naabyākataṁ nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca🔽naakusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naakusalaṁ nahetuñca naabyākataṁ nahetuñca
analyzed: na akusalam na hetum ca na abyākatam na hetuñca dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na hetu dhammo  uppajjati hetu paccayā na akusalam na hetuñca na abyākatam na hetuñca dhammam paṭicca  na akusalaḥ na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na akusalam na hetuñca na abyākatam na hetuñca
translated: Dependent on a non-causally-related wholesome and a non-causally-related unwholesome and a non-causally-related indeterminate …🔽Dependent on a non-causally-related unwholesome and a non-causally-related indeterminate …

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naakusalaṁ nahetuñca
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na abyākataḥ na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na akusalam na hetuñca
translated: Dependent on a non-causally-related unwholesome and a non-causally-related indeterminate …

original: naabyākataṁ nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nahetu ca naabyākato nahetu ca dhammā
analyzed: na abyākatam na hetuñca dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na hetu ca na abyākataḥ na hetu ca dhammā
translated: Dependent on a non-causally-related unwholesome and a non-causally-related indeterminate …

original: uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Naakusalaṁ nahetuñca naabyākataṁ nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: uppajjanti hetu paccayāḥ na akusalam na hetuñca na abyākatam na hetuñca dhammam paṭicca
translated: unwholesome and neither-unwholesome-nor-wholesome conditions.🔽From a wholesome and an unwholesome and a neither-unwholesome-nor-wholesome condition that is not a root cause

original: nakusalo nahetu ca naakusalo nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.
analyzed: na kusalaḥ na hetu ca na akusalaḥ na hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā pañca
translated: unwholesome and wholesome and neither-unwholesome-nor-wholesome conditions arise that are not root causes.🔽From a wholesome and an unwholesome and a neither-unwholesome-nor-wholesome condition that is not a root cause

original: Nakusalaṁ nahetuñca naakusalaṁ nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: na kusalam na hetum ca na akusalam na hetuñca dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati
translated: a wholesome condition that is not a root cause arises.

original: hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ nahetuñca naakusalaṁ nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nahetu
analyzed: hetu paccayā na kusalam na hetuñca na akusalam na hetuñca dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na hetu
translated: From a wholesome and an unwholesome and a neither-unwholesome-nor-wholesome condition that is not a root cause🔽an unwholesome condition that is not a root cause arises.

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ nahetuñca naakusalaṁ nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na kusalam na hetuñca na akusalam na hetuñca dhammam paṭicca
translated: From a wholesome and an unwholesome and a neither-unwholesome-nor-wholesome condition that is not a root cause

original: nakusalo nahetu ca naakusalo nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalaḥ na hetu ca na akusalaḥ na hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: unwholesome and wholesome and neither-unwholesome-nor-wholesome conditions that are not root causes arise.🔽(Abbreviated.)

original: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa sabbattha vitthāro
translated: From a root cause: thirty-one. From an object: twenty-four. … From a nutriment: twenty-four. … From a condition: thirty-one. (In each section, the method of exposition is the same as in the preceding section.)

original: Nakusalaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Nakusalaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Nakusalaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Nakusalaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nanahetu ca naabyākato nanahetu ca dhammā

translated: With a profitable cause and a neutral cause, there is a profitable idea produced by a cause condition. … With a unprofitable cause and a neutral cause, there is an unprofitable idea produced by a cause condition. … With a profitable cause and an unprofitable cause and a neutral cause, there is a profitable idea produced by a cause condition. … (Abridged.)🔽With a profitable cause and a neutral cause, there is a profitable idea produced by a cause condition. … With an unprofitable cause and a neutral cause, there is an unprofitable idea produced by a cause condition. … With a profitable cause and an unprofitable cause and a neutral cause, there is an unprofitable idea produced by a cause condition. … (Abridged.)🔽With a profitable cause and a neutral cause, there is a profitable idea produced by a cause condition. … With an unprofitable cause and a neutral cause, there is an unprofitable idea produced by a cause condition. … With a profitable cause and an unprofitable cause and a neutral cause, there is a profitable idea produced by a cause condition. … (Abridged.)
